input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is SCOMActor

This wrapper returns the monitoring object by monitoring class.
Sample Item XML:
<items> <item> <operation-name>get-monitoringobject-by-monitoring-class</operation-name> <timeout-secs>120</timeout-secs> <command-parameters> <monitoringclass> <monitoringclass-id>1f06bba9-58a9-fd0b-d980-08d5af2e67d3</monitoringclass-id> </monitoringclass> </command-parameters> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
operation-name[Required] Operation that will be executed
timeout-secs[Optional] Time in seconds after which the request will time-out of not completed. Default is: 60 secs
command-parameters[Required] This is the parent tag that contains actual parameters required to execute this particular operation.
monitoringclass[Required] This is the parent tag that contains monitoringclass-id for which monitoring object will be returned.
monitoringclass-id[Required] The id of the monitoring class for which monitoring object will be returned.

documentation.description: This wrapper returns the monitoring object by monitoring class.
